attributes.action: halt the proposed 'cost-cutting' plans to close/merge 37 schools across Herefordshire, considering the significant impact on rural communities, personlised learning for Every Child and the environment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Herefordshire Council have recently unveiled draft plans to close or merge 37 of the county's schools.  Both the primary and secondary sector will be affected, with countless teachers and support staff members being forced out of work, and the education of hundreds of children being disrupted.  Please join us in our fight FOR rural schools and communities and AGAINST the people who think that money is more important than the education of our children.
